mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( NO, USER_NO, SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, TITLE, CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCHEDULE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{loginMember.no}, #{vo.scheduleTypeNo}, TO_TIMESTAMP( #{vo.startDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), TO_TIMESTAMP(#{vo.endDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{vo.title}, #{vo.content} )
mapper.select: SELECT S.NO, S.USER_NO, S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, M.NO, M.TEAM_NO, M.NAME AS WRITERNAME, ST.NAME AS TYPENAME, ST.COMMON_YN FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.USER_NO = M.NO JOIN SCHEDULE_TYPE ST ON S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO = ST.NO WHERE S.START_DATE = #{startDate} AND S.END_DATE = #{endDate} AND S.TITLE = #{title}

SELECT S.NO, S.USER_NO, S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, M.NO, M.TEAM_NO, M.NAME AS WRITERNAME, ST.NAME AS TYPENAME FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.USER_NO = M.NO JOIN SCHEDULE_TYPE ST ON S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO = ST.NO WHERE S.USER_NO = #{no} AND (S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO = 1 OR S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO = 3 OR S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO = 4)

SELECT S.NO, S.USER_NO, S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO, S.START_DATE, S.END_DATE, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, M.NO, M.TEAM_NO, M.NAME, ST.NAME AS TYPENAME, ST.COMMON_YN FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.USER_NO = M.NO JOIN SCHEDULE_TYPE ST ON S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO = ST.NO WHERE M.TEAM_NO = #{teamNo} AND S.SCHEDULE_TYPE_NO = 2
